biotools.summary: PSOPIA (Prediction Server Of Protein-protein InterActions) is an AODE for predicting protein-protein interactions using three seqeucne based features; (I) sequence similarities to a known interacting protein pair, (II) statistical propensities of domain pairs observed in interacting proteins and (III) a sum of edge weights along the shortest path between homologous proteins in a PPI network.

bioschemas.name: PSOPIA
